text: tay tantaikku nanri ceyyumpatiyaka nam manitanukku nallupatecam ceytirukkirom. (Eninum, katavul enpatarku) evvita ataramum illatavarrai enakku inaiyakkumpati (manitane!) Avarkal unnai nirppantittal (avvisayattil) ni avarkalukku kilppatiyate! Ennitame ninkal tirumpa ventiyatirukkiratu. Ninkal ceytu kontiruntavarraip parri (nanmaiya timaiya enpatai) accamayam nan unkalukku arivittuvituven
